original: Pepper & Carrot Episode 17: A Fresh Start

This will be a line-by-line translation of the comic. Some of the episodes already have translations, but there's usually always something to improve. For the rest, the goal is to have all episodes translated at some point.
Pepper&Carrot is a webcomic by David Revoy, ww.davidrevoy.com - it is published under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 licence
[Pepper] You don't teach real witchcraft! I'm going - to the witches of Ah!
[Pepper] Alright then, off to the land of the setting moons
[Pepper] Shichimi can tell us how to join the witches of Ah
[Pepper] Carrot, get out the map and compass: it's too cloudy to see where I'm going
[Cayenne] "A good dark stare is worth a dozen useless curses! ...
[Pepper] Personally, I would've preferred to learn a few good attack spells; but anyway...
[Pepper] shoot... no more broom or equipment,
[Pepper] this is going to be a long trip...
[Pepper] I'm totally worn out too Carrot...
[Pepper] And it's been days since we've eaten anything.
[Cumin] "To know the edible plants is to know where to find ready-made potions against hunger!"
[Pepper] If only she had taught me a single one!
[Thyme] "A true witch of Chaosah needs neither compass nor map. A starry sky will suffice"
[Pepper] ... I would've preferred a real course in divination!
[Pepper] Now you know the whole story.
[Shichimi] ...and you tell me that you're here because they haven't taught you anythin g ?
